sentences.sentence: You don't want to get chilblains like I did the first time I went out on the snow.
sentences.translation: 你不想跟我一样，第一次到雪地上去就得了冻疮吧？

sentences.sentence: There was a man in our State of Song who could make medicine for preventing chilblains.
sentences.translation: 我们宋国有一个人，会制作防止冻疮的药。

sentences.sentence: Chilblains are only one stop short of frostbite, you know, and occur in all the same places.
sentences.translation: 你知道，冻疮与冻伤只有一步之遥，而且它们发生的部位全都一样。
